# Redshift

This is a [Sun or Moon](https://puzz.link/rules.html?moonsun) puzzle but with Foreshadow-style clues - that is, when a symbol has a number, it occurs that many spaces along the loop (if a number were a 0, it'd behave like a normal Sun or Moon clue).   

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2024/redshift1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
